revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=LPV4-U2 |revision=-300S |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/01/2013 |manuf_country=Japan |manuf=Silex |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=print server |fcc_id=FDI000000019 |ic_id=6102A-054 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CNS3411;CNS3411-300 (Star); |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AA160TSB-5G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Edimax EW-7722UTn |wi1_module_if=USB |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3072 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=LPV4-U2-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^LPV4-U2-[A-Fa-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} "PX84573XA PM181823FX ''ZP''" (or something, that's probably completely wrong) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The USB Wi-Fi dongle shown in the FCC photos would appear (and is assumed) to be an [[Edimax EW-7722UTnâ€Ž]].
Additional specifications, per the FCC manual, follow... :Power consumption: about 2.3 W (max.) :Dimensions: [[Dimensions::72 mm x 127 mm x 25 mm]] :Weight: [[Weight::100 g]]
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual.
